original_text:
Wild Pumpkins
Un luogo desolato
Se appena senti la parola zucca ti vengono in mente Jack O’ Lantern, fantasmi e sedute spiritiche, sei capitato nel posto giusto!
Wild Pumpkins è infatti la slot a tema Halloween ambientata in un cimitero spettrale, tra vecchie lapidi, boccette di veleno, teschi e pipistrelli. Il colore predominante è il blu scuro della notte con sfumature di viola date dalla nebbia che sale dal terreno. Non c’è una vera e propria griglia, ma i rulli sono separati l’uno dall’altro da rami scheletrici.
La grafica è bellissima, i disegni delle icone sono nitidi e ogni più piccolo dettaglio contribuisce a farci respirare un’atmosfera gotica.
Il comparto sonoro è costituito da una musica suggestiva che si sposa appieno con l’aura di mistero che accompagna le giocate.
Qualche informazione su Wild Pumpkins
La griglia di gioco ha 5 rulli e 4 righe, con 4096 modi per vincere, come indicati nel riquadro in basso a sinistra. Si vince abbinando simboli identici su rulli adiacenti, minimo 3, partendo da quello di sinistra e procedendo verso destra.
Tra le funzioni che torrio non devono mancare in una slot, c’è l’Autoplay, che attiva i giri automatici da un minimo di 5 a un massimo di 1.000. Volendo, si può farli andare all’infinito.
Altra funzione interessante è il tasto Turbo, che accelera la rotazione dei rulli.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) è del 95,5%, mentre la volatilità è media.
La paura fa novanta
Passiamo ora a dare un’occhiata ai simboli e ai vari Bonus presenti in Wild Pumpkins. Accedendo alla tabella dei pagamenti, noteremo che i simboli sono divisi in tre gruppi in base al loro valore: basso livello, medio livello e alto livello. Al primo gruppo appartengono le carte da gioco, al secondo i denti appuntiti, il veleno e la caramella – occhio. Le vincite maggiori sono assicurate dalle icone appartenenti al terzo gruppo, ossia il teschio, la pianta carnivora e il pipistrello. Jack O’Lantern è il nostro Wild, e oltre a sostituire tutti i simboli, eccetto lo Scatter, per completare delle combinazioni vincenti, compare sempre insieme a un moltiplicatore x1, x2 o x3. Nel caso ci siano più Jolly a completare due diverse combo, gli importi vanno moltiplicati e poi sommati.
Lo scheletro del pipistrello è il nostro Scatter e ne servono tre per attivare la Supernatural Spins feature. Durante i giri gratuiti ogni Wild che atterra sulle bobine rimane appiccicato anche nelle successive giocate. Ogni Scatter aggiuntivo, inoltre, ci ricompensa con ulteriori Free Spins.

Domande Frequenti 
Posso giocare a Wild Pumpkins anche su smartphone?

Sì, perché è disponibile anche in tecnologia HTML5 che permette alla slot di girare anche su dispositivi portatili.



Vorrei provare la slot prima di giocare soldi veri. Posso farlo?

Sì. Sul nostro sito è presente la versione DEMO che ci offre la possibilità di testare il gioco in modalità totalmente gratuita.



E se volessi giocare soldi veri?

Basta fare un giro nei principali casinò online che includono Wild Pumpkins nella loro offerta.

raw_translation.response:
Wild Pumpkins
A Desolate Place
If the word pumpkin makes you think of Jack O'Lanterns, ghosts, and seances, then you've come to the right place! Wild Pumpkins is the Halloween-themed slot set in a spooky cemetery amidst old gravestones, bottles of poison, skulls, and bats. The dominant color is the dark blue of the night with shades of purple given by the mist rising from the ground. There is no real grid, but the reels are separated from each other by skeletal branches.
The graphics are beautiful, the icon designs are crisp, and every small detail contributes to creating a Gothic atmosphere.
The sound compartment is made up of evocative music that fully blends with the aura of mystery that accompanies the games.
Some Information on Wild Pumpkins
The game grid has 5 reels and 4 rows, with 4096 ways to win, as indicated in the bottom left panel. You win by matching identical symbols on adjacent reels, with a minimum of 3, starting from the left and proceeding to the right.
Among the features that must not be missed in a slot, there is Autoplay, which activates automatic spins from a minimum of 5 to a maximum of 1,000. You can even run them infinitely.
Another interesting function is the Turbo button, which accelerates the rotation of the reels.
The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 95.5%, while the volatility is medium.
Fear Makes Ninety
Let's now take a look at the symbols and various bonuses in Wild Pumpkins. Accessing the paytable, we will notice that the symbols are divided into three groups based on their value: low level, medium level, and high level. The first group consists of playing cards, the second of sharp teeth, poison, and candy-eyes. The highest wins are guaranteed by the icons belonging to the third group, namely the skull, the carnivorous plant, and the bat. Jack O'Lantern is our Wild, and in addition to replacing all symbols, except the Scatter, to complete winning combinations, it always appears with a x1, x2, or x3 multiplier. If there are multiple Jokers completing two different combos, the amounts are multiplied and then added.
The skeleton of the bat is our Scatter, and three are needed to activate the Supernatural Spins feature. During the free spins, every Wild that lands on the reels remains sticky even in the subsequent spins. Each additional Scatter also rewards us with further free spins.

FAQs
Can I play Wild Pumpkins on my smartphone?

Yes, because it is also available in HTML5 technology, which allows the slot to run on mobile devices.

I'd like to try the slot before playing for real money. Can I do that?

Yes. Our site offers a DEMO version that allows us to test the game in totally free mode.

And if I wanted to play for real money?

Just take a look at the main online casinos that include Wild Pumpkins in their offerings.

Review:
 
Gameplay Features

Wild Pumpkins is a Halloween-themed slot game with beautiful graphics and sharp design. The game grid has 5 reels and 4 rows with 4096 ways to win. Autoplay and Turbo features are present. The theoretical RTP is 95.5%, and the volatility is medium.

Symbols and Design

The symbols in Wild Pumpkins are divided into three groups based on their value: low, mid, and high level. The Wild symbol is Jack O'Lantern, which always appears with a x1, x2, or x3 multiplier. The Scatter is the skeleton bat, and we need three of them to activate the Supernatural Spins feature. The game's design is set in a spectral cemetery, amidst old tombstones, vials of poison, skulls, and bats.

Ways to Win

To win in Wild Pumpkins, players need to match identical symbols on adjacent reels from left to right. There are 4096 ways to win in this game, allowing players various opportunities to win big.

Bonus Features

The Supernatural Spins feature is triggered by three Scatter symbols, and every Wild that lands on the reels remains sticky even in the following rounds. Each additional Scatter rewards more Free Spins. Autoplay and Turbo features are present, which adds excitement to the gameplay.

Availability

Wild Pumpkins is available in HTML5 technology, making it suitable for mobile devices. The demo version is available on the website, where players can try the game for free. The game can also be played with real money in major online casinos that offer Wild Pumpkins.

Review: Wild Pumpkins
A Desolate Place
If the word pumpkin reminds you of Jack O'Lanterns, ghosts, and spirit sessions, you've come to the right place! Wild Pumpkins is a Halloween-themed slot set in a spectral cemetery, amidst old tombstones, vials of poison, skulls, and bats. The predominant color is the dark blue of the night, with shades of purple from the fog that rises from the ground. There is no real grid, but the reels are separated from each other by skeletal branches. The graphics are beautiful, the icon designs are sharp, and every detail contributes to the gothic atmosphere that surrounds the game.
The sound department is made up of evocative music that fully blends with the aura of mystery that accompanies the gameplay.

Some Information on Wild Pumpkins
The game grid has 5 reels and 4 rows, with 4096 ways to win, as indicated in the box in the bottom left corner. You win by matching identical symbols on adjacent reels, at least 3, starting from the left and progressing towards the right.
Among the features that must not be missing in a slot, there is Autoplay, which activates automatic spins starting from a minimum of 5 up to a maximum of 1,000. If you want, you can make them go indefinitely.
Another interesting feature is the Turbo button, which speeds up the rotation of the reels.
The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 95.5%, while the volatility is medium.
Fear Makes Ninety
Let's now take a look at the symbols and various bonuses present in Wild Pumpkins. Accessing the paytable, we will notice that the symbols are divided into three groups based on their value: low level, mid-level, and high level. The first group includes the playing cards, the second includes sharp teeth, poison, and candy - eye. The biggest wins are ensured by the icons belonging to the third group, namely the skull, the carnivorous plant, and the bat. Jack O'Lantern is our Wild, and in addition to replacing all symbols except Scatter to complete winning combinations, he always appears with a x1, x2, or x3 multiplier. In case there are more Jack O'Lanterns to complete different combos, the amounts are multiplied and then added up.
The skeleton bat is our Scatter, and we need three of them to activate the Supernatural Spins feature. During the free spins, every Wild that lands on the reels remains sticky even in the following rounds. Each additional Scatter, moreover, rewards us with more Free Spins.

Frequently Asked Questions
Can I play Wild Pumpkins on my smartphone?
Yes, because it is also available in HTML5 technology, which allows the slot to run on mobile devices.

Can I try the slot before playing with real money?
Yes. On our website, the demo version allows us to test the game completely for free.

And if I want to play with real money?
Just take a look at the major online casinos that include Wild Pumpkins in their offer.
